AI Description: R package providing optimized functions for computing row and column sums and means, sample variances, and correlations for matrix-like objects representing matrices or data frames.
Core Features: Efficient Computation Of Basic Statistics For Matrix-Like Objects, Supports Row & Column Sums, Means, Sample Variances, & Correlations, Optimized For Performance With Large-Scale Data Sets, Integration With R Programming Environment
General Tags: R Package, Matrix Statistics, Data Analysis, Statistical Computing
